parameters.name: ClusterId
parameters.description: The region ID of the service.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. By default, the current point in time is the end of the time range to query.

parameters.name: EventType
parameters.description:
The event type. Valid values:

*   Normal
*   Warning

parameters.name: InstanceName
parameters.description: The instance name. For more information about how to obtain the instance name, see [ListServiceInstances](~~412108~~).

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Default value: 100.

parameters.name: ServiceName
parameters.description: The service name. For more information about how to query the service name, see [ListServices](~~412109~~).

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. The time must be in UTC. The default value is seven days ago.
